forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A mix of clouds and sun. High 23C. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Sunshine and clouds mixed. High 74F. Winds WSW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers in the evening will evolve into a more steady rain overnight. Low 13C. Winds SSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near 12mm.

forecastday.title: Saturday

forecastday.title: Saturday Night

forecastday.fcttext: Windy with a steady light rain in the evening. Showers continuing late. Low 54F. SSW winds at 20 to 30 mph, decreasing to 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 100%.
